title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, June 27, 1861
summary: Hotchkiss describes his activities en route to the army camp, reaching Monterey, Virginia. He wrote about travelling and sleeping conditions, the scenery, and people's reactions to the beginning conflict.
keywords: Agriculture, Camp Life, Church/Religious Activity, Troop Movement, Women, Family, Patriotism, American Civil War
